# Normalization of Age

Age for all species will be normalized based on average life expectancy from birth found online from the following sources

-   human: 26061 days (as of 2021) from [WHO](https://data.who.int/indicators/i/90E2E48)

-   chimpanzee : 12008.5 days from [Research Paper](https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC8364750/)

-   macaque: 5475 days from [The Macaque Website](https://macaques.nc3rs.org.uk/about-macaques/life-history)
